Good Comments: Proper translation and encoding. A quality release.
First episode some minor errors but they are aware of it. Song TL'd and a decent sub track to a nice but somewhat dark idol anime. Take your pick.
Idols = love. Idols = life. Oh wait, this is about the subs? My bad. Way better than HS and worth the day or so wait. Consistent speed and quality.
Bad Comments: Main issue is the ugly dialogue font but that will supposedly be fixed in the batch.
Don't let their white release status on nyaa fool you, these subs are by far superior to HorribleSubs.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Wake Up, Girls! Shichinin no Idol

Good Comments: Good typesetting and they sub the insert song.
